answers.a: by reason of, on account of
at the time of, in the days of
at variance with, in opposition to, in contrast to
by the power of, by force of

questions.q: The air plane is ..... taking off.
There couldn't be machine guns .... Napoleon.
The country was finally subdued .... arms.
The dog is sleeping ... its master.
He recovered his health quickly .... sea-air.
... his many years of experience in this field, he is the best man for the job.
